description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Beat IT! is the ultimate multiplayer pad-passing party game!   1-8 Players compete, performing actions in time with the beat. The winner is left holding the pad! Think you can keep up?  (Only 1 Xbox Control Pad Required)
description.short: Beat IT! is the ultimate multiplayer pad-passing party game!   1-8 Players compete, performing actions in time with the beat. The winner is left holding the pad! Think you can keep up?  (Only 1 Xbox Control Pad Required)
